thread.title_full: Red hot! Radhika Apte looks gorgeous in this backless dress - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Red hot! Radhika Apte looks gorgeous in this backless dress
text:
Radhika Apte looks gorgeous in this backless dress 
Radhika Apte looked gorgeous at Maharashtra's Most Stylish Awards ceremony held in Mumbai on Tuesday. The Bollywood actress opted to wear a backless maroon dress and was a stunner on the red carpet.
Photos: Hrithik Roshan, Sai Tamhankar, Sonali Bendre at awards gala 
 
On the work front, Radhika Apte will feature along side Akshay Kumar and Sonam Kapoor in 'Padman'.
Also read:  Sonam Kapoor, Radhika Apte to star in 'Padman' with Akshay Kumar 
  
The actress has been appreciated for her bold roles and critically acclaimed performances.
Also read:  Shocking! Radhika Apte's film with sex scene being sold as porn 
 
Also read:  LEAKED! Radhika Apte's nude scenes from film go viral 
 
Also read:  Watch: Radhika Apte slams reporter when asked about leaked 'Parched' video
